item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Apollo13Themes Apollo13 Framework Extensions.This issue affects Apollo13 Framework Extensions: from n/a through 1.9.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-24880|2024-06-04T17:42:59.179Z -- apollo13themes -- apollo13%20framework%20extensions
